languages.text: {n}Каллигос отмахивается от женщины и впивается взглядом в Говорящего-с-Богами.{/n} "Мне осточертело бесцельно бродить по лесам, старик. Я охотник. И без добычи знатно зверею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос отмахивается от женщины и впивается взглядом в Говорящего-с-Богами.{/n} "Мне осточертело бесцельно бродить по лесам, старик. Я охотник. И без добычи знатно зверею".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос отмахивается от женщины и впивается взглядом в Говорящего-с-Богами.{/n} "Мне осточертело бесцельно бродить по лесам, старик. Я охотник. И без добычи знатно зверею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and bores his eyes into Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I'm sick and tired of aimlessly roaming through the forest, old man. I'm a hunter. And without prey, I go crazy."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and bores his eyes into Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I'm sick and tired of aimlessly roaming through the forest, old man. I'm a hunter. And without prey, I go crazy."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos hace un gesto para despedir a la mujer y luego clava su mirada en Habla-con-Dioses.{/n} «Estoy muy harto de vagar sin rumbo fijo por el bosque, anciano. Soy un cazador. Y sin una presa, me convierto en una bestia».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos hace un gesto para despedir a la mujer y luego clava su mirada en Habla-con-Dioses.{/n} «Estoy muy harto de vagar sin rumbo fijo por el bosque, anciano. Soy un cazador. Y sin una presa, enloquezco».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯挥手把老祭司打发走，冷酷的目光望向了“神谕”。{/n}“我一直在这片林子里漫无目的地乱晃，老家伙，我已经受够了。我是个猎人，如果再找不到猎物，我就会变成凶狠的野兽。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯挥手把老祭司打发走，然后望向“神谕”。{/n}“我一直在森林里漫无目的地到处乱晃，老家伙，我已经受够了。我是个猎人，如果找不到猎物，我会发疯的。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos fait signe à la femme de s'en aller et braque son regard intransigeant sur Parle-aux-Dieux.{/n} « J'en ai plus qu'assez de tourner en rond dans ces bois, vieillard. Je suis un chasseur, et quand je ne trouve pas de proie, je me change en véritable bête sauvage. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos fait signe à la femme de s'en aller et braque son regard intransigeant sur Parle-aux-Dieux.{/n} « J'en ai plus qu'assez de tourner en rond dans ces bois, vieillard. Je suis un chasseur, et quand je ne trouve pas de proie, je me change en véritable bête sauvage. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}カリゴスはその女性を振り払い、神々との語り部に目を向ける。{/n}「あてもなく森を歩き回るのは、もううんざりだ。おい、老いぼれ。俺は狩人なんだ。獲物がいないと気が狂いそうになる」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスはその女性を振り払い、神々との語り部に目を向ける。{/n}「あてもなく森を歩き回るのは、もううんざりだ、老いぼれ。俺は狩人なんだ。獲物がいないと気が狂いそうになる」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos schickt die Frau mit einer unwirschen Geste weg und richtet seinen durchdringenden Blick auf Spricht-mit-den-Göttern.{/n} "Ich bin es leid, ziellos durch die Wälder zu streifen, alter Mann. Ich bin ein Jäger. Und wenn ich keine Beute habe, werde ich schnell zur Bestie."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos winkt die Frau fort und durchbohrt Spricht-mit-den-Göttern mit seinen Blicken.{/n} "Ich bin es gründlich leid, ziellos durch den Wald zu streifen, alter Mann. Ich bin ein Jäger. Und ohne Beute werde ich wahnsinnig."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos, eliyle kadını kovarak zalim bakışlarını Tanrıların Dili'ne çeviriyor.{/n} "Ormanda amaç bilmeden yorgun argın yürümekten gına geldi ihtiyar. Ben bir avcıyım. Av bulamadığımdaysa muazzam bir canavara dönüşürüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves the woman away and turns his flinty gaze on Speaks-With-Gods.{/n} "I am sick and tired of aimlessly trudging through the woods, old man. I am a hunter. And without a quarry, I turn into quite the beast."
